definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: A hybrid team is made up of both generalists and specialists.
sentences.chinese: 混合團隊由專家和多面手共同組成。

sentences.english: All generalists are not created equal.
sentences.chinese: 所有多面手水平各不相同。

sentences.english: A vertical team is composed of generalists.
sentences.chinese: 垂直團隊由多面手組成。

sentences.english: He argues that these bankers have to be generalists " with an edge ".
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，這些銀行家必須是“具有優勢”的多面手。

sentences.english: Out of all the commando's the Mastermind is the most versatile.
sentences.chinese: 在所有特種兵中，攝魂師是最多面手得。

sentences.english: The presidency is a job for a generalist.
sentences.chinese: 總統的職位是一個多面手做的。

sentences.english: They tend to be upbeat, optimistic and outgoing. They are high-energy multitaskers.
sentences.chinese: 他們都是樂觀外向的人，都是能充當多面手的達人。

sentences.english: The young performer boasted himself to be an all-rounder.
sentences.chinese: 這個青年演員自稱是個多面手。

sentences.english: Generalists are still hard to obtain.
Additionally, staff should improve quality to become all- rounders .
sentences.chinese: 三是員工應提高綜合素質成爲多面手。

sentences.english: He boasted to the up-country woman that he was an all-round man.
sentences.chinese: 他對外鄉女人誇海口說他是多面手。

sentences.english: Third, the battlefield is the army's duty to protect " all-rounder ."
sentences.chinese: 其三，陸航是戰場勤務保障的“多面手”。

sentences.english: Generalists are typically high-paid consultants who are difficult to find.
sentences.chinese: 多面手通常是一些要價很高並且很難找到的顧問。

sentences.english: I don't think this spells the end for generalists .
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲，這對多面手來說，是個終結。

sentences.english: She's the best all-rounder they've seen in years.
sentences.chinese: 她是他們看到的最棒的年老多面手。

sentences.english: Or do you take a hybrid approach and include both generalists and specialists on your team?
sentences.chinese: 以混合方案組織的團隊既包括多面手，又包括專家。

definition: Tiger Balm (medicine)/jack of all trades (and master of none)(slang)
qualified/competent (professionally)/to be up to a task
to assume personal responsibility (idiom); to take charge of a section
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
switch to a job one was not trained for
special duty/assigned full time to a task
